name: (2022AU-2541-T2) Mazeroid
description:
Team Members: Albert R. Schierman, Randall H. Norwich, Greg W. Narotski

Game Summary:

You are a pilot of an experimental scout spaceship and was testing a new engine that caused the ship to go into an alternate asteroid dimension that has ghost asteroids flying through it. You must navigate your way through the maze, looking for the key to escaping the dimension, and once found you need to find a specific location in the maze that is clear enough for you to warp back to Earth. 

Game Outline:

Trapped in an alien asteroid, you must navigate a maze-like cave. In order to escape, you must find the key, then go to the exit gate. Watch out, asteroids are flying all around and you have limited fuel.

•             Navigate a maze with space drift

•             Asteroids float around maze, shoot to blast them

•             Fuel limit, asteroids give fuel on destroy

•             Maze is procedurally generated

•             Asteroids break into smaller asteroids

•             Grab key, then win at exit gate

•             Player has 3 Lives to navigate maze

Controls:

•             W            - Thrust forward

•             A/D         - Rotate ship

•             SPACE - Fire laser

•             ENTER- Start Game
